name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At about 18:00 on November 11, in Hangzhou, Zhejiang, a BMW hit several people and cars at the intersection of Dinglan Road and Danonggang Road in Dingqiao Town, Shangcheng District. According to the police report, a total of 5 people were hit, one of whom was seriously injured and died after failed rescue. The police said the cause of the accident was that Huang Moumou improperly operated the parking and mistakenly stepped on the accelerator instead of the brake, causing the accident.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At this moment, many residents in Daya Bay District, Huizhou, Guangdong reported that a large area of unknown yellow smoke appeared in the sky.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A local Zhuhai netizen posted a post describing the incident and its details:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 12, the owners of Sunac Oriental Court in Xi'an, Shaanxi Province, went to the Xi'an Housing and Urban-Rural Development Bureau again to defend their rights because the property certificates had not been issued to the owners two years after the handover of the houses, and some projects in the community were not completed (underground garages, heating, etc.).

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Huizhou Fire Department reported that the production process of Shell Phase II in Daya Bay Petrochemical Zone fluctuated, and the company took emergency measures, so no fire occurred and no casualties were caused.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 12, Zhuhai Sports Center was closed, with police cars patrolling inside, and some citizens spontaneously came to the scene to send flowers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 11, in Tiaobinshan City, Liaoning Province, the video showed that several people were arguing when a car next to them suddenly started and hit the people in front of them.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 11 (Released), Qinzhou, Guangxi. Villagers of Baisha Village, Napeng Town, Qinnan District, confronted urban management and law enforcement officers to protest against the government's occupation of land and forced construction.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A BBC reporter was obstructed and pushed by a man while reporting live at the Zhuhai Sports Center.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 6, Trump was elected as the 47th President of the United States, which also sparked heated discussions in the simplified Chinese circle. For this reason, we specially invited six big Vs in the simplified Chinese circle to talk about their views on the US election, as well as their views on a series of policies after Trump took office, Sino-US relations, the Russia-Ukraine war, the Taiwan Strait issue and the future prospects of the United States.
They are senior media person, former Director of the Chinese Department of Voice of America Gong Xiaoxia @Sasha_Gong, former BBC Chinese Editor-in-Chief, Dad Wu @vivianwubeijing, CEO of Dasheng Media, well-known blogger, Sydney Daddy @SydneyDaddy1 who is currently running for state legislator, well-known military blogger Xu Mouren @xumouren_yt, well-known financial blogger Xiao Cui Chats About Finance @cui_news, and everyone's favorite "Seven Steps of Democracy" leader Toronto Square Face...
fullContent:
11月6日，特朗普当选了第47任美国总统，在简体中文圈也掀起了激烈的讨论.为此，我们特别邀请了简中圈的六位大V来聊聊他们对于美国大选的看法，以及他们对的特朗普上台后的一系列政策，中美关系，俄乌战争，台海问题和对美国未来的展望。
 他们分别是 资深媒体人，前美国之音中文部主任龚小夏  @Sasha_Gong ,前BBC中文总编，大声传媒CEO吴薇  @vivianwubeijing ，知名博主，目前正在竞选州议员的悉尼奶爸 @SydneyDaddy1 ,知名军事博主徐某人@xumouren_yt    ，知名财经博主小翠聊财经 @cui_news  ,以及大家最喜欢的“七步民主教”教主多伦多方脸  @Torontobigface 。
欢迎点击链接，收看完整版 《美国大选大家谈 （上）》：川普为什么大胜？如何看待“美国优先”？你最期待哪项政策？民主党的竞选策略出了什么问题？

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 12, in Fuzhou City, the owners of Zhongfang Wanbao City at the intersection of West Second Ring Road and Industrial Road in Taijiang District collectively defended their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 12, a police notice about the Zhuhai Sports Center incident was posted at the entrance of Carnegie Mellon University in the United States, as well as a recent notice from Henan University banning night cycling.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 12, in Changchun, Jilin, a netizen posted that when he was using a Huawei phone to bypass the firewall, he received a text message from the Changchun Public Security Bureau, which said that he had detected the use of a VPN and asked him to go to the Public Security Bureau to accept punishment that day. After the netizen went to the local Public Security Bureau, he was fined 600 yuan by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After the Zhuhai hit-and-run incident, today, a Weibo post by Yu Minhong ten years ago was widely forwarded: Chinese society is full of hostility, we need to think about where the root of the problem lies. When fairness and justice become unattainable, there are no normal channels to solve problems, officials protect each other, and human dignity is completely deprived, society has become a society that turns good people into bad people. The comments on the Weibo post have been cleared, and netizens said, "Old Yu has changed now, and I dare not say these words."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Trump appointed Musk and Ramaswamy to co-lead the Department of Government Efficiency, which the statement said was dedicated to "cutting government bureaucracy, slashing redundant regulations, reducing wasteful spending, and restructuring federal agencies — a key part of the 'Save America' campaign."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 12, the report was asked about the advanced level of the J-35 series fighter jets.
Expert: I dare not say...

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 12, a reporter from Japanese media TBS wrote that when he was filming at the Zhuhai Sports Center, he was surrounded by people who claimed to be "Zhuhai citizens" and called the police. He was taken to the police station and had to delete all his data.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Chinese human rights activist Xu Zhiyong was sentenced to prison for "subversion of state power". He recently went on a hunger strike to protest the prison's illegal deprivation of his right to communicate with his fiancée Li Qiaochu.
An open letter from a human rights group pointed out that Xu Zhiyong has been on hunger strike for 40 days. His only request is to restore his right to communicate with his fiancée, but this has not been approved by the Lunan Prison where he is serving his sentence. He has not been allowed to meet with a lawyer so far, making it difficult for him to convey his true physical condition and hunger strike situation to the outside world.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 11, London, UK. A Chinese student was dissatisfied with the food in the university cafeteria, so he posted a domestic food safety notice on the cafeteria. "White people's food is really terrible, please provide a Chinese food window"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 12, Chengdu, Sichuan. A Longjiang pork trotter rice restaurant in Wuhou District was exposed online, where a waiter fished out the waste oil in the trash can in broad daylight, and left as if nothing had happened.
On November 13, some netizens went to the restaurant to film it. The video showed that some diners were dining in the restaurant, and the aunt who fished out the waste oil was still working.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 11, Anshan, Liaoning. A woman posted a video saying that she would run for the presidency of Japan next Monday. Her campaign manifesto was: to strive to increase the birth rate of the Japanese people, to make Japan full of "little boys" and "little fat boys", to change the Japanese language to Northeastern dialect, and to change Japan to Japan City, Liaoning Province.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Russia is facing a serious population crisis, and the authorities have recently been actively discussing the establishment of a "sex department" to improve the situation of continued low fertility rates.
Some experts have launched a petition, hoping that the sex department will promote the increase in fertility rates. The plans in the petition include: forcibly shutting down the power and the Internet during late night hours, encouraging people to concentrate on having children, and proposing that the state subsidize couples' first dates.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 13, Guangzhou, Guangdong. A milk tea shop clerk claimed that a child stole something. "Is it right for a child to steal milk tea?" Then the child's mother kicked the clerk and grabbed the clerk's hair.
Then the woman who beat the child wanted to leave the scene with the child, but was stopped by the security guard. The woman opened her mouth to bite the security guard, and was slapped by the security guard.
Then, the woman took out a fruit knife from her bag and pointed it at everyone.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The restaurant owner responded: If I use waste oil, I will be hit by a car and killed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 9, Wang Hai, a well-known anti-counterfeiter, posted a video saying that he bought 10 top-selling peanut oils on Pinduoduo. After testing, they were found to be all adulterated.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After the Zhuhai Sports Center incident that was reported online, some communities began to count the "eight missing people" and the "three lows and three fews" people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Incomplete statistics of domestic car-clash incidents in 2023-2024 by netizens:
At 17:25 on January 11, 2023, a car collided with pedestrians at the intersection of Tianhe Road and Tiyu East Road in Guangzhou, resulting in 6 deaths and more than 20 injuries.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Yesterday’s hot search on Weibo: A butterfly landed on the waist of a young navy girl at the Zhuhai Air Show.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens added

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 13, the November 12 edition of the People's Political Consultative Conference Daily was required to be urgently intercepted and destroyed on the spot.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 13, Sichuan University Law Professor Han Xu wrote: Judicial justice is the last barrier. Once this barrier is lost, various violent extreme incidents will be difficult to avoid.
We are fortunate that we did not appear on the road where the crime occurred, but we are all on the bus of society. When the bus of society is not safe, how can each of us passengers be safe?
At present, the article has been deleted.
